description: Try our easy to follow French Shallot, Chive & Verjuice Dressing recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Salad dressing,Low saturated fat,High protein,Seafood,Low sugar,Low fat,Easter
name: French Shallot, Chive & Verjuice Dressing Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Combine verjuice and 1 tbs water in a small saucepan. Heat until just warm. Add shallot to pan with butter. Swirl pan to melt butter. Season to taste with salt and white pepper.
Arrange oysters in the half shell on a platter on a bed of crushed ice or coarse rock salt. Spoon 1 tsp of dressing onto each oyster and top with chopped chives. Serve while the dressing is warm.
